modName: Witcher 3 Geralt of Rivia Racemenu Preset
summary: The first ever Geralt of Rivia preset that actually resembles his appearance in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][color=#ffff00][size=5][u]NOTICE: This mod has been abandoned, use at your own discretion[/u][/size][/color][/i][/b]

I tried searching for a good Geralt face preset but found none, so I decided to create one myself. I've managed to put together a Geralt face preset that actually resembles his appearance in Witcher 3 with the help of a couple of great mods created by their respective creators. 

[color=#00ff00]You MUST have these mods installed:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu by expired6978[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6923/?]Extended Slider Colors by Expired[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows by lthot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards by lthot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9198/?]Skyrim Witcher Experience by AlphaWolF[/url] [color=#ffff00]OR [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34007/?]Skyrim Witcher Experience Enhanced by Talyn82[/url]
[color=#00ff00]
Install them in this order[/color] to minimize risk of it being unable to work.
[color=#00ff00]Make sure your race is set to Geralt (skyrim) [ Ultimate Witcher MOD.esp (WitcherRace) ] 
DO NOT CHOOSE "Geralt of Rivia" race or "Geralt (skyrim) (WitcherRaceVampire)" race
[/color]
[b]Installation:
[/b]1) Download the jslot file manually and place it into ( steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\skse\plugins\chargen\presets )
2) Open Skyrim. Open console and type "showracemenu"
3) Head over to the Racemenu Presets tab and press your "Load Preset" button (shown on bottom left of screen)
4) Click on "Witcher 3 Geralt.jslot" for SWE [color=#ffff00]OR [/color]"Witcher 3 Geralt Enhanced" for SWEE
5) Explore Skyrim as the Legendary White Wolf.

[b]Uninstallation:
[/b]There shouldn't be any problems uninstalling it. Simply delete the jslot file from ( Data\skse\plugins\chargen\presets )
[color=#ff0000]
[size=3]UPDATE:[/size]
[/color]Talyn82 updated his Witcher mod (v1.2). The result is that you won't be able to have beard and hair options. Solution to this to use AlphaWolF's mod for now.
author: Crywren
